data.name: Pixxxel
data.detailed_description:
Pixxxel is a game where you can immerse yourself in the colorful world of platform games, but far from simple ones. You have a gigantic number of obstacles that will not leave you
you at ease. Unique levels and traps, time dilation mechanics - what else do you need to enjoy the game? You will start the level again over and over again,
But doesn't complexity give more fun from passing the level? Of course it is! Four types of locations and new traps constantly appearing, this is never
won't let you get bored. Start your passage and try to keep within the shortest period of time, will you succeed? As the saying goes, you never know until you try.
good luck with your passage!

data.short_description: Pixxxel is a game where you can immerse yourself in the colorful world of platform games, but far from simple ones.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GSO 512
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GSO 1024
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
